mapper.insert: insert into member( member_id, name, nickname, password, email, tel ) values( #{memberId}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{email}, #{tel} )
mapper.select: select member_id from member where name = #{name} and email = #{email}
mapper.update: update member set nickname = #{nickname}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, tel= #{tel}, profile_img= #{profileImg}, updated_at = sysdate where member_id = #{memberId}
update member set enabled = 0, withdrawal = 'Y', email = null, profileImg = null where member_id = #{memberId}
